channels.title: Channel Management
channels.description: Manage your AI model channels and configurations.

errorBanner.message: {{count}} channel(s) need attention for disabled due to errors

messages.addAtLeastOneModel: Please add at least one supported model
messages.pendingMappingWarning: There are pending model mappings, please add them before saving.
messages.duplicateMappingWarning: Duplicate model mapping detected. Please remove the duplicate mapping before saving.
messages.fetchModelsSuccessLarge: Successfully fetched {{count}} models. Use search to find specific models.
messages.modelsNotConfirmed: You have selected models but not confirmed them. Please click the "Confirm Selection" button to confirm the selected models, or cancel the selection and then save.
messages.Unauthorized: Unauthorized, please check the API key of the channel
messages.Not Found: Endpoint not found, pleast check the base url of the channel
messages.Interval Server Error: Interval server error, please confirm the channel configuration

errors.fetchProbeData: Failed to load channel health data
errors.fetchNames: Failed to load existing channel names
errors.fetchOrdering: Failed to load channels for ordering

channelProbe.label: Channel Health Monitoring
channelProbe.enabledDescription: Automatically monitor channel health and performance metrics
channelProbe.frequencyDescription: How often to check channel health status
channelProbe.probeDescription: It won't actually probe, it's based on request data statistics
channelProbe.frequencyWarning: Changing the frequency will cause historical data to become invalid

create.title: Add Channel
create.description: Create a new AI model channel.

test.title: Test Channel
test.removeFailedConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove all failed models from the selected list?

bulkImport.title: Bulk Import Channels
bulkImport.description: Import multiple channels from CSV data. One channel per line, comma-separated fields.
bulkImport.supportedTypes: Supported types: openai, anthropic, anthropic_aws, anthropic_gcp, gemini_openai, deepseek, doubao, moonshot, zhipu, zai, deepseek_anthropic, moonshot_anthropic, zhipu_anthropic, zai_anthropic, openrouter, xai
bulkImport.inputPlaceholder: Enter channel data to import, one per line...
bulkImport.baseUrlRequired: Line {{line}}: Base URL cannot be empty
bulkImport.apiKeyRequired: Line {{line}}: API Key cannot be empty
bulkImport.duplicateName: Line {{line}}: Channel name "{{name}}" is duplicate. Each channel must have a unique name
bulkImport.duplicateNameWithExisting: Line {{line}}: Channel name "{{name}}" already exists on server. Each channel must have a unique name

placeholders.authorizationUrl: OAuth URL will appear here after starting OAuth
placeholders.callbackUrl: Paste the full callback URL here

errors.bulkCreateUnsupported: Codex channel does not support bulk create

claudeCode.label: Use Claude Code
claudeCode.description: Use Claude Code CLI API with specialized headers and system message
claudeCode.editDisabled: Claude Code settings cannot be changed

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.multiLineHint: One API key per line, will create multiple channels if provided multiple keys.

supportedModels.label: Models
supportedModels.required: Please add at least one supported model
supportedModels.clearAllDescription: Are you sure you want to clear all {{count}} models?
supportedModels.codexOAuthCredentialsRequired: Codex channel requires OAuth credentials JSON

autoSyncSupportedModels.label: Auto-sync supported models
autoSyncSupportedModels.description: Automatically sync supported models list every hour from the provider API

tags.label: Tags
tags.description: Add tags to categorize and filter channels. Press Enter, comma, or space to add a tag.

remark.label: Remark
remark.placeholder: Enter a note or remark for this channel...
remark.description: Add notes or remarks about this channel for reference

forceArrayInstructions.label: Force Array Instructions
forceArrayInstructions.description: Force the channel to accept array format for instructions

forceArrayInputs.label: Force Array Inputs
forceArrayInputs.description: Force the channel to accept array format for inputs

replaceDeveloperRoleWithSystem.label: Replace developer role with system
replaceDeveloperRoleWithSystem.description: Replace developer role with system before sending requests (Bailian only)

buttons.batchAddTooltip: Enter multiple models separated by commas, e.g., gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo, claude-3-opus

enable.title: Enable Channel
enable.description: Are you sure you want to enable channel "{{name}}"? The channel will be available for use after enabling.
enable.warning: Please ensure the channel configuration is correct and test the connection before enabling to avoid service interruptions.

disable.title: Disable Channel
disable.description: Are you sure you want to disable channel "{{name}}"? The channel will be unavailable after disabling.

archive.title: Archive Channel
archive.description: Are you sure you want to archive channel "{{name}}"? Archived channels are hidden by default and will not appear in the channel list unless the archived filter is explicitly selected.
archive.warning: This channel will be hidden from the default view. You can view archived channels by selecting the 'Archived' status filter.

extraModelPrefix.title: Extra Model Prefix
extraModelPrefix.description: Configure extra model prefixes to allow access to this channel using prefixed model names. For example: with prefix 'deepseek', both 'deepseek/deepseek-chat' and 'deepseek-chat' can access this channel.

autoTrimedModelPrefixes.title: Auto-Trimmed Model Prefixes
autoTrimedModelPrefixes.description: Configure prefixes to automatically trim from model names. For example: with prefix 'deepseek-ai', model 'deepseek-ai/deepseek-chat' becomes 'deepseek-chat'; both 'deepseek-ai/deepseek-chat' and 'deepseek-chat' can access this channel
autoTrimedModelPrefixes.noPrefixesFound: No prefixes found in supported models
autoTrimedModelPrefixes.allPrefixesAlreadyAdded: All prefixes have already been added

modelMapping.title: Model Alias
modelMapping.description: Use aliases to expose channel-supported models under alternative names without transforming the request model. For example: register 'gpt-4' as an alias of 'gpt-4-turbo', and both names will be handled by this channel
modelMapping.validationRequired: Both alias and target model are required
modelMapping.targetInvalid: Target model must be in supported models
modelMapping.duplicateAlias: Each original model can only be mapped once

hideOriginalModels.label: Hide Original Models
hideOriginalModels.description: When enabled, only the transformed model names (aliases, prefixed models, etc.) will be exposed in the model list, hiding all untransformed original model names.

parameters.title: Override Body
parameters.description: Provide JSON-formatted overrides to customize the request body sent through this channel. Use "__AXONHUB_CLEAR__" as the value to remove a parameter from the request body.

headers.title: Override Headers
headers.description: Configure custom HTTP headers that will be applied to all requests sent through this channel.
headers.sensitiveWarning: This header may contain authentication credentials. Double-check before saving.

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration

config.title: Proxy Settings
config.description: Configure how this channel connects through a proxy server

proxy.environmentHint: The channel will use proxy settings from environment variables (HTTP_PROXY, HTTPS_PROXY, NO_PROXY)
proxy.disabledHint: The channel will connect directly without using any proxy

options.title: Transform Settings
options.description: Configure how the channel transforms request data

bulkOrdering.title: Bulk Channel Ordering
bulkOrdering.description: Drag and drop to reorder channels. Higher weight channels will be preferred when selecting channels.

bulkArchive.title: Bulk Archive Channels
bulkArchive.description: Are you sure you want to archive {{count}} selected channels? Archived channels are hidden from the default list.
bulkArchive.warning: This action will hide all selected channels from regular views. You can still find them by filtering by archived status.

bulkDisable.title: Bulk Disable Channels
bulkDisable.description: Are you sure you want to disable {{count}} selected channels? Disabled channels won't process requests until re-enabled.
bulkDisable.warning: This action will make all selected channels unavailable. Enable them again from the channel list when needed.

bulkEnable.title: Bulk Enable Channels
bulkEnable.description: Are you sure you want to enable {{count}} selected channels? Enabled channels will be available to process requests.
bulkEnable.warning: This action will make all selected channels available for use. Make sure the channels are properly configured.

bulkDelete.title: Bulk Delete Channels
bulkDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected channels?
bulkDelete.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone
bulkDelete.warningDetail: This will permanently delete all selected channels and their related data. This cannot be recovered.

delete.title: Delete Channel
delete.warningTitle: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the Channel and all its related data.

errorResolved.title: Resolve Channel Error
errorResolved.description: Are you sure you want to resolve the error for channel "{{channelName}}"? This will clear the error message: "{{errorMessage}}"

weight.title: Adjust Channel Weight
weight.description: Adjust the ordering weight for channel "{{name}}".
weight.rangeHint: Weight must be between {{min}} and {{max}}. Higher values will be prioritized.

section.title: Templates
section.description: Load saved override configurations or save current settings as a template for reuse

fields.name: Template Name
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this template is for...

save.title: Save as Template
save.description: Save current override configuration as a reusable template

bulk.title: Apply Template to Multiple Channels
bulk.description: Apply a template to {{count}} selected channel(s)
bulk.multipleTypesError: All selected channels must be of the same type to apply a template
bulk.applyInfo: The template will be merged with existing channel configurations. New headers and parameters will be added, existing values will be preserved.
